name: Ether Bunny
text_description: The Ether Bunny is a fragile creature from ethereal realms. It can absorb ether energy to heal its allies. Each turn, Ether Bunny can heal one ally card for +5HP.
illustration_description: A charming little bunny emanates a faint, soothing light. It huddles in a mystical forest, ether spirals dancing around it. The ethereal landscape bathes in the soft hues of dawn, adding a serene sense of tranquility to the picture.
